DOC.brief_summary: This study is being carried out to see if adding ZD1839 to other standard supportive care is more effective than standard supportive care alone for the treatment of patients with NSCLC whose disease has recurred after previous chemotherapy treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Iressa vs Best Supportive Care - 2nd/3rd Line Survival Study
